metadata.title: CVE-2017-20146 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Usage of the CORS handler may apply improper CORS headers, allowing therequester to explicitly control the value of theAccess-Control-Allow-Origin header, which bypasses the expected behavior ofthe Same Origin Policy.

criterions.comment: golang-github-coreos-discovery-etcd-io package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
